game_description: Traverse the open sky, climbing ever higher by going from balloon to balloon. Simply grab the nearest string by reaching out or leaping then keep an eye out for your next opportunity. But donâ€™t take too long as the balloon can only hold you for so long. Enable an internet connection and who knows, you might find yourself with some competition.
review_1: Combine this vibe with what they have going on in that old iOS/Android game Sneezies you would easily have gold with this experience. I do really like it regardless, good stuff here. I can see this calming a frustrated person down. Therapeutic? Yes.
review_2: Would like a smooth turning option and a night time scene would be good.
